title: Finding profitable cryptocurrency pairs: search and analysis
subtitle: How to find profitable coin pairs to trade
body: InterTrader sorts through _a lot_ of data to find you the most profitable opportunities. The outcome of its analysis is mostly presented on the [direct comparison page](/user-guide/compare-page/ "The Compare Page") for each market pair, and the search/analysis results page. Between these two sections, you'll find a lot of the key information you need. ## Search ![Analysis search form](/gin-data/images/1527772574406-analysis-form.png)
